mapper.select: SELECT a.id, title, introduce, article_type, language, technology_type, md_text_id, create_time, create_by, likes, a.status as 'privacy', b.mdText as 'mdText' from article a INNER JOIN articleMdText b ON a.md_text_id = b.id where a.id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT id, title, introduce, article_type, language, technology_type, md_text_id, create_by, create_time, likes, (SELECT name from user where id = create_by LIMIT 1) as 'create_by_name' FROM article a where a.status = #{status} AND a.del_flag = #{delFlag} order by id desc limit #{start},#{number}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.introduce, a.article_type, a.language, a.technology_type, a.md_text_id, a.create_time, a.create_by, (SELECT name from user where id = a.create_by limit 1) as 'createByName' FROM article a inner JOIN question_answer b ON b.question_id = #{questionId} and a.id = b.article_id and a.status = #{status} AND a.del_flag = #{delFlag} order by a.id desc limit #{start},#{number}
mapper.insert: insert into article value( null, #{article.title}, #{article.introduce}, #{articleList}, #{languageList}, #{article.technologyType}, #{article.id}, #{article.createTime}, #{article.createBy}, null, 1, #{article.privacy}, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update article set del_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
